headline.main: Shock and Grief After Mother, 4 Children Die in House Fire
headline.print_headline: Shock and Grief After Mother, 4 Children Die in House Fire

lead_paragraph: Residents of a small Massachusetts town are grieving the deaths of a woman and her four children who perished in a house fire that reduced their home to rubble.
snippet: Residents of a small Massachusetts town are grieving the deaths of a woman and her four children who perished in a house fire that reduced their home to rubble....
